column4: anyone know of a media sharing app similar to the new winamp remote stuff?
what does the winamp thing do?
does it let you access your mp3 collection remotely?
Duncal, yea, not NAT setup or anything
no* ... you just point your browser
that's what mp3tunes.com does i think; you upload your music collection and then it lets you play/download it from any PC
(without software on the other PCs, you just goto the website)
yea, i'm still not convinced its a good idea to upload all my music to a remote server
i was looking for a more local solution
dont know of anything then (i'm here 'cos I can't get mp3tunes to work with ubuntu properly, despite having linux support...)
do you have your entire collection up there?
